verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I am Jehovah; I am that I am,
And my trumpet shall soon call out.
I formed the world with a whisper,
But I'm getting ready, I'm getting ready,
I'm getting ready to shout!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It's the Name above all names,
We shall declare it, we shall declare it.
It's the Name above all names,
We shall shout it to a dying world.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Who will declare My Name?
Who will shout My Name
In the middle of the nations?
Who will take the shield of faith
And the sword of My Word
And declare my name to a dying world?
He who has declared Me thus far,
Shall walk in even greater power,
For the sands of time are running out,
But My Name shall be declared in this final hour.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I will possess My people, I'll take every inch
That they will surrender to Me
For I'm gathering an army
And I'm giving them My name;
My Word in their mouth,
Shall set the captives free.
